name: HANDWARMERS - cashmere tubes to warm your hands or arm
description:
It is very, light, cosy, delicate and warm cashmere garment.
Can be worn on many occasions.
Because there is no thumb - just a hole - you can use it also as a sleeve. 
Especially when you want to wear something delicate and there is very cold outside - you don't need to put a warm jumper on your party dress :))

You won’t be disappointed with this beautiful garment
Handknitted from luxury italian cashmere yarn


Measurements:
one size

Let me know which colour you want:

93 - powder pink
100 - beige
106 -  blue


They are unique and one of a kind.
There is no other pair which is exactly the same
